I am honored to be assisting in establishing the Western Region office for such an amazing company.  If you are seeking broad-based general experience with your next construction project then we are NOT for you. But IF you are seeking a contractor who specializes in the unique and often complex build-out of Medical office buildings and suites, Industrial warehouses, upgrades and site improvements or a better way of creating your new office then you owe it to yourself to learn more about MIO Specialty Contractors. Medical, Industrial and Commercial offices are all we do!Our experience and expertise allows us to better prioritize your project, bring in a better more specialized team, and provide value-enhancing RELEVANT and CURRENT previous project experience. I welcome your call personally if you have some questions or need advice on your next medical, industrial of office project. Brian

As Director of Operations for Wasson Commercial Contracting Mr. Houston leads with his experience, vision and extensive training in leadership and holistic knowledge of the construction industry and built environments. Mr. Houston graduated from Arizona State University with dual B.S. in engineering and business in 2003 while simultaneously running a company which employed a team of Electrical Engineers at Palo Verde Nuclear Power Generating Station. Under Mr. Houston’s direction he grew this company to $40Million in annual sales and successfully exited that company which is still in business. As Director of Operations, Mr. Houston provides distinct and direct leadership gained from training received from the best leadership schools in history and over a decade and- a-half of running companies. Mr. Houston surrounds himself with the best people in each position he can find and then empowers and supports them to be as successful as they can be. The result is a very positive environment, with personal growth opportunities and steadfast loyalty. Wasson Commercial Contracting is a local leader in construction, construction process improvement and design-assist/design-build and constructability review. Highlights:•	Maintains a leadership and management growth plan• Heads all Construction, Field supervision and Estimating activities • Utilizes advanced level scheduling techniques and software to manage all facets of the building management process. • Is recognized as an industry expert in the retail construction industry. Serves as an expert witness in construction defects cases and has published several whitepapers on the retail and construction industry, including current retail trends and recommended best practices

Delivery IT, Inc (dba DeliveryOnDemand) provides premium, on-demand scheduled delivery services for large format items at competitive prices by crowdsourcing professional, licensed and insured delivery companies. Since 2012 our proprietary and state-of-the-art software has helped manage thousands of last mile, same-day deliveries between retailers and their customers, ensuring 100% positive results and tracking every possible metric from warehouse to doorstep and beyond. DII is the winner of the 2012 Hightide Award, honoring the most innovative new businesses nationally; the winner of the 2013 Arizona Innovations Challenge and 2014 SBDC Small Business of the year! Connect with us at www.delivery-it.com or call 1-888-920-5682 to learn how your business can benefit from the DeliveryOnDemand™ solution and our award winning team.  There are never any costs to your company for using it, and many of our customers mark up the services and create a new revenue stream. So call today to get this powerful new tool to connect with and better service your customers.

Have been involved in C-level management, sales & business development, transportation procurement, and project management for over 2 decades. Brian’s success, as well as that of his firm relies singularly on the satisfaction of each and every one of his clients. Having extensive leadership training and experience, a visionary focus and proven track-record, Brian has created multiple successful companies and long-lasting relationships. SaveOnCouriers.com is a web2.0 database, online marketplace and portal that connects and tracks those who need same-day local delivery service with qualified, contracted couriers. Similar in practice to what Priceline.com has done for the hospitality industry; the price per delivery is determined via online auction conducted on the SaveOnCouriers.com platform and SaveOnCouriers.com charges a fee per transaction. SaveOnCouriers.com finds the customers by direct and indirect online marketing, pays the insurance for each package or parcel, and carries all licensing and bonding. Using proprietary algorithms it identifies courier efficiencies and tracks shipments, verifies deliveries and quality, collects payment and pays the couriers.Specialties: By using an auction format, SaveOnCouriers.com ensures that our clients receive the best possible pricing and fastest possible service; as clients can decide based on a number of factors including courier availability, estimated pick-up/drop-off times, track record and of course price. We also provide for back-up (contingency) services as required, and internally evaluate the various couriers, our satisfaction rating, our website and our customer retention levels to ensure an overall better, more service-oriented environment than the status-quo

I was very impressed with Brian's ability to simply and effectively communicate the pros and cons of our reconstruction project, as well as his enthusiasm and project management skills.  Brian was always responsive and easy to work with throughout our project and stood behind all of his company's work. He was also helpful in suggesting other reliable and high-integrity contacts while we were starting our new business. Brian is a highly gifted communicator, networker and project manager and a genuinely nice guy. I feel very lucky to have worked with him.

The result is an easy, open dialog and easy to meet expectations. Throughout the entire process, to include warranty work, Jennifer ensured that herself and her staff were informed, and everything they were responsible was ready for the crews when they arrived. Jennifer was a treat to work for.

Steve Means LEED AP BD+C
CEO / Owner of Sterling CM
March 18, 2009, Brian reported directly to Steve

I have known Steve for about 7 years as a former boss, and current mentor and friend. He has proven himself time & again as both a sensible source of wisdom, and a caring person. Steve is an excellent leader, organizer, problem solver, negotiator, manager, and has an excellent rapport with people of all ages. His communication skills, both written and verbal, are excellent.I am the owner of a Commercial General Contracting company in Phoenix, AZ and look to Steve on a regular basis for insight, advice and positive reinforcement. He has never let me down! He has garnered the experience and reputation to positively affect any situation and understand the interests and perspectives of all persons involved. I have watched Steve create for himself a very successful career; devoting himself to a great family, and to help build a successful and financially viable company. He told me a story once about a large public swimming pool that they had built that was not functioning as designed. He was doing everything he could to fix the problem, but a major portion of the pool was going to have to be removed and replaced, at a substantial cost to him and his company. But the words he told me regarding that situation are words that I live by to this day. He said that "all that mattered was that the owner received the product that he had paid for," and that Steve "didn't know what the problem was or whose fault it was, but the one person who wasn't at fault was definitely the owner." These words exemplify the kind of man that Steve is. In summary, I highly recommend Steve for any position or endeavor that he may seek to pursue. He is a valuable asset for any organization.If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Steve Means LEED AP BD+C

summary: I posses verifiable, extensive leadership and operations experience in engineering, construction, IT and logistics; and bring to the table the kind of breadth of experience, vision and execution sought in today's competitive marketplace.   Please allow me the opportunity to elaborate:After 12 years in US Special Ops I started college at the age of 30 obtaining bachelor’s degrees simultaneously in Engineering and Construction Management. While still in college I founded an engineering consulting firm of 9 employees to advise the Palo Verde Nuclear power station on conducting construction while maintaining continuous operations. In 2012 I was awarded the Tallwave Hightide award recognizing top leaders in Arizona. http://tallwave.com/news/tallwave-high-tide-i-finalist-delivery-it-wins-arizona-commerce-authority-innovation-challenge-with-delivery-technology-for-the-retail-industry/In 2014 I graduated from a 9-month CEO Academy sponsored by the Arizona Commerce Authority. In 2014 I lead a team to win the Arizona Commerce Authority’s Venture ready program.http://www.azcommerce.com/programs/arizona-innovation-challenge/awardees/2013-fall-awardeesIn 2015 I received the SBDC Small business of the year award for Maricopa County.http://www.azsbdc.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/2015AZSBDCnoads-FinalFinal.pdfI am not bragging – I am applying for a new position within a company demands both the best people and their best efforts – and that is what you’ll receive with me. I consider myself a highly regarded, awarded and experienced visionary leader, and a perfect candidate for a prestigious and progressive organization. Upon request I can provide references and letters of recommendation from my current employer, my mentor of 20+ years, current and former employees, others I have conducted business with; as well as from members of the Arizona Commerce Authority and SBDC. I am also a published author, speaker and recognized expert within my fields.
name: Brian Houston
title: Operations Director at MIO Specialty Contractors
